proposal: Understanding the importance of accurate, real-time market data across various assets, Pyth is revolutionizing how 50+ blockchains access crucial information. With 95+ major market participants fueling your network, the depth of your data ecosystem is impressive. Congrats on reaching 96 holders on the ETH network! If integrating decentralized exchanges or creating community-driven lotteries and governance models aligns with your vision, our tools are designed to empower communities like yours. Let's enhance the utility of your token together.
